title: missing method "SKCanvas.Scale(float scaleX, float scaleY, float focusX, float focusY)"
body:
SKCanvas is missing a scale function overload that allows to specify the x- and y- center of the scale operation.

Interestingly, I could not find this in the Skia source code at
https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/include/core/SkCanvas.h

but as I am replacing Android.Canvas api calls, where the Android.Graphics.Canvas class has this overload (and it is internally using Skia itself, I guess) there should be a way to implement this... :-|

Can I achieve this in any other way? (I am not so good at matrix operations, sorry for that)

I am using 1.49.4-beta

comments.author: migueldeicaza

you can replicate the behavior like this:
